treatment.reference: Methanogenium frittonii Harris et al. 1996 is a later synonym of Methanoculleus thermophilus (Rivard and Smith 1982) Maestrojua´n et al. 1990 IJSEM 55:1097-1099
treatment.description: Secondary alcohols might be used as electron donor by single strains. Most strains require acetate as a carbon source for growth, but single strains might be autotrophic. Trypticase peptone or yeast extract stimulates growth in all strains. The DNA G+C content is 55–59 mol%; the type strain has a G+C content of 59 mol%. The type strain is DSM 2373T (=OCM 174T).
